sentences.sContent: It related to the harmonious of interval, harmony and counterpoint.
sentences.sContent_eng: It related to the harmonious of interval, harmony and counterpoint.
sentences.sCn: 这种审美形态包括音程的“和谐”、和声的“和谐”、复调对位中的“和谐”。

sentences.sContent: So, there's the melody up above, this bassoon playing the counterpoint, kind of in the middle, and then the bass playing these notes quietly underneath.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, there's the melody up above, this bassoon playing the counterpoint, kind of in the middle, and then the bass playing these notes quietly underneath.
sentences.sCn: 然后，旋律在上面，这支巴松管来演奏对位，基本上在中间，而低音提琴在底下悄悄地演奏这些音符。

synos.tran: 复调；对位法；旋律配合；对应物

remMethod.val: counter (对应的) + point (点) → 对应物

trans.tranOther: the combination of two or more tunes played together so that they sound like one tune
